title: Values and Responsibility | Mark Manson, Mikhaila, and Jordan Peterson
description:
For episode 5, season 4 of the Jordan B. Peterson Podcast, my daughter, @MikhailaPeterson and I spoke with @MarkManson, the best-selling author of The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck, and more recently, Everything Is F*cked: A Book about Hope (which has sold over thirteen million copies worldwide). In this clip we discussed the importance of values and responsibility.

In the full episode - linked on Mikhaila's channel at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dGDF2tTq6xw&t, we discussed how to properly set goals, the destabilizing effects of social media, and the value of committed relationships.

12 Rules for Life: An Antidote to Chaos: https://jordanbpeterson.com/12-rules-for-life/
Maps of Meaning: The Architecture of Belief: https://jordanbpeterson.com/maps-of-meaning/

--- LINKS ---

Website: https://jordanbpeterson.com/
12 Rules for Life Tour: https://jordanbpeterson.com/events/
Blog: https://jordanbpeterson.com/blog/
Podcast: https://jordanbpeterson.com/podcast/
Reading List: https://jordanbpeterson.com/great-books/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/jordanbpeterson
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jordan.b.peterson/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/drjordanpeterson

--- PRODUCTS ---

Personality Course:  https://jordanbpeterson.com/personality
Self Authoring Suite: https://selfauthoring.com/
Understand Myself personality test: https://understandmyself.com/
Merchandise: https://teespring.com/stores/jordanbpeterson
